span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 有益的，有促进的：tending to promote or assist
【例】be conducive to education 于教育有利的
【例】low tax is conducive to entrepre-neurship[,ɑntrəprə'nɝʃɪp]企业家.
【近】facilitative, useful
【反】unhelpful, useless 无用的
【记】 conduce + tive
